price: 57. Je ne leur réclame aucune subsistance ni n’attends qu’ils Me nourrissent.
arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: mā urīdu min'hum min riz'qin wamā urīdu an yuṭ'ʿimūni
